authors.bio: ❝ My name is Eric Stanley. Started my career as a QA tester back in 2005 and have been learning software testing ever since. For those who have no idea what WinRunner is, I worked on that! After recent technology evolution, I figured development will eventually replace testing, so I started learning a little development! I see a lot of content in the internet on ‘how to start a (successful) blog’, but no one says how to stay a blogger, which is why I didn’t learn that yet and this is my current attempt. ❞
authors.name: Eric Stanley

group.title: Why we built a company before building a product again
group.author: Eric Stanley, Dennis Brotzky
group.excerpt: this is my excerpt for testing

group.title: Understanding the Gatsby lifecycle with Narative
group.author: Dennis Brotzky, Thiago Costa, Brad Tiller, Mack Mansouri, Eric Stanley
group.excerpt: With the growing community interest in Gatsby, we hope to create more resources that make it easier for anyone to grasp the power of this incredible tool.

group.title: Why we built a company before building a product
group.author: Thiago Costa

group.title: Building the new Hopper.com
group.author: Dennis Brotzky
group.excerpt: Creating a new website for Hopper, one of the top 4 most downloaded travel apps in the U.S, along with Uber, Lyft.

group.title: How Figma changed the way we design
group.author: Thiago Costa
group.excerpt: To understand why Figma is the best design tool for our company, you have to understand what we do. As a designer.

group.title: Building Hopper's Media Centre
group.author: Dennis Brotzky
group.excerpt: To understand why Figma is the best design tool for our company, you have to understand what we do. As a designer.
